SageTVPlugin.Name: Fuzzy's Malore Tweaks
SageTVPlugin.Description: A collection of Tweaks I've made for the Malore Menus. Banners in the Show List, Remove Banner from Description pane.
SageTVPlugin.Author: Fuzzy
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
0.5.0 - Banners in Show List, Hide Banner in Description Pane
0.5.1 - Adjusted Banner/Bracket Alignment
0.5.8 - Added Local Caching to Banner Images - greatly increasing scrolling speed (after images have been displayed once to be cached).
0.5.9 - Updated Phoenix API dependency to 2.3.11
0.5.9.1 - No Change - submitted to force manifest update for google code changes
